vehicles.description: Damaged white compact car stopped on the road, without lights, facing the ego vehicle's direction
vehicles.explanation: This car is a potential hazard as it is obstructing the lane and may not be visible to other road users due to its lights being off

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a damaged white compact car stopped on the road, without lights, and facing the direction of the ego vehicle. This car is a potential hazard as it is obstructing the lane and may not be visible to other road users due to its lights being off. There are no vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects present in the image.

1.description and explanation: The object is a compact van, identified by its enclosed body suitable for carrying passengers or goods. It is larger than a standard car but smaller than a full-sized van. This type of vehicle may affect driving behavior by its slower acceleration and larger blind spots. It requires careful monitoring, especially when the ego car needs to maneuver around or follow closely in traffic.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with caution, reduce speed significantly, and if possible, switch on high beams briefly to assess the situation further. Prepare to stop or manoeuvre around the obstacle, ensuring the adjacent lane is clear before doing so. Utilize hazard lights to alert other drivers of the potential danger ahead.
